documentType: property closing document and related correspondence
summary: This document set details the real estate closing for a property in Bradford, NH, purchased by Granite Reality LLC (managed by Jeffrey W. Roberts) from a trust. It includes closing statements, wire transfer records, and related email correspondence regarding the transaction, which occurred on December 13, 2019, for a purchase price of $1,070,750.00.

persons.name: Jeffrey W. Roberts
persons.context: Listed as the manager of the buying entity, Granite Reality LLC, which purchased a property in Bradford, NH.

persons.name: Jennifer Johnson
persons.role: Buyer's Agent at Four Seasons Sotheby's International Realty
persons.context: Identified as the buyer's agent/agency representative in the closing documents.

persons.name: Margaret Weathers
persons.role: Listing Agent/Broker Associate at Four Seasons Sotheby's International Realty
persons.context: The listing agent for the property sale; sent an email notifying of a price reduction and commission details.

persons.name: Rebecca Russo
persons.context: The processor for the closing; received email notifications about wire transfers and the price reduction.

persons.name: Alex Garcia
persons.context: Listed as the attorney representing the seller (trustee of a trust) in the closing documents.

persons.name: Jen Marshall
persons.role: Originator contact at Nutter McClennen & Fish LLP
persons.context: Named in the wire transfer notification as the originator's contact person at the law firm handling funds for Granite Reality LLC.

connections.description: Jeffrey W. Roberts is identified as the Manager of Granite Reality LLC, the entity purchasing the property.
Jennifer Johnson, as the buyer's agent, professionally represented Jeffrey W. Roberts/Granite Reality LLC in the real estate transaction.
Margaret Weathers communicated directly with processor Rebecca Russo via email regarding the sale price and commission.
Alex Garcia is listed as the attorney for the seller, who is the trustee of an unnamed trust.

events.title: Property Closing in Bradford, NH
events.description: Closing of the sale of a property in Bradford, NH, from a trust to Granite Reality LLC for $1,070,750.00.

events.title: Incoming Wire Transfer for Purchase
events.description: A wire transfer of $994,291.12 was received by the escrow account from Granite Reality LLC, facilitated by Nutter McClennen & Fish LLP.

events.title: Price Reduction Notification
events.description: Listing agent Margaret Weathers emailed processor Rebecca Russo to notify that the property purchase price had been reduced to $1,070,750.00.

keyFacts: Granite Reality LLC, managed by Jeffrey W. Roberts, purchased a property in Bradford, NH, for $1,070,750.00 on December 13, 2019.
The seller was a trustee of an unnamed trust, represented by attorney Alex Garcia.
The transaction involved a $16,062.00 tax stamp payment to the Merrimack County Registry of Deeds.
Funds for the purchase were wired from Granite Reality LLC's account, with the originator being the law firm Nutter McClennen & Fish LLP, attn: Jen Marshall.
The real estate agents involved were from Four Seasons Sotheby's International Realty, with Jennifer Johnson as the buyer's agent and Margaret Weathers as the listing agent.
